---
title: "Extension Example"
filters:
  - escape_nested_tex
format: 
  pdf: default
  html: default
---

Align*
$$
  \begin{align*}
    x^2
  \end{align*}
$$

Alignat*
$$
  \begin{alignat*}{3}
    x^2
  \end{alignat*}
$$

Multline*
$$
  \begin{multline*}
    x^2 
  \end{multline*}
$$

Gather*
$$
  \begin{gather*}
    x^2
  \end{gather*}
$$
